alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 9:05AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bristol, Washington, Newport, southeastern Kent and Bristol Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 905 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charlestown, or 7 miles west of South Kingstown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Fall River, Warwick, Dartmouth, South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Westerly, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Middletown, Narragansett, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, East Greenwich, Warren, Hopkinton, and Charlestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington; Western Kent
